thread.title: Chasing Life Canceled After Two Seasons

author: TV Guide
title: Chasing Life Canceled After Two Seasons
text: Chasing Life Canceled After Two Seasons ABC Family has pulled the plug on Chasing Life, according toThe Hol... Comment   TV Guide Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 3:28 PM Updated at 5:58 PM Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 3:28 PM Updated at 5:58 PM ABC Family has pulled the plug on Chasing Life , according to The Hollywood Reporter. The drama, which was adapted from the telenovela Terminales , ended its second season on Monday, with a series-low of 486,000 viewers. Italia Ricci starred as April, a journalist whose life is turned upside down when she's diagnosed with cancer. Will you miss the show? Other Links From TVGuide.com
